name: Arcane Intern
description:
This game was a class project for Game Production at the University of Central Florida in the spring of 2018. It is compatible with both controller and keyboard/mouse. Available for download on this page are both Windows PC and Mac versions of the game.


Gameplay

Arcane Intern is a Fantasy 2D Platformer where you are an intern in a master wizards shop. As is an intern's job. you must go out into the world and find the items your boss has requested. Using only your wits and spells at your disposal, you will fight through the magical world around you so that you may keep your job!

Controls

The game is made mainly to be used with a controller but can also be played with keyboard/mouse. Move with "wasd",  jump with "Space", and fire your different spells with "LMB, RMB, Shift, and Z"

Credits
